synopsis.text:
Southeast Asia, get ready to be captivated by the thrilling world of competitive yo-yoing with Shunichi Domoto, an athletic fifth-grader who has yet to discover his true potential. When his best friend Beso's yo-yo is taken by a school bully, Shunichi steps up to the challenge and, after just three days of training, manages to win it back. However, his newfound love for yo-yoing is quickly put to the test when he faces the extraordinarily talented Seito Hojoin.

Determined to prove himself, Shunichi enrolls in Japan's national yo-yo championship, where he learns new skills and faces formidable opponents. With his sights set on becoming the best yo-yo artist in the world, Shunichi's journey is filled with passion, rivalry, and the ultimate quest for redemption. Can he rise to the top and claim victory over his greatest rival, Seito Hojoin?

Experience the thrill of competitive yo-yoing like never before in this exciting anime, now available with an English dub for Southeast Asian audiences!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
